data.title: Practical information
data.text:
TicketsFull price

price*

Ongoing exhibitions / Collection:

"Collection" ticket

Access to the collection, on the day of the visit, as well as to the exhibitions currently on show in the museum:

• "Vera Molnár"

• "Hervé Di Rosa"

• "Bernard Réquichot"

€15€12

"Children's Gallery + Collection" ticket

Access to the Children's Gallery according to the time slot chosen, and to the collection, on the day of the visit

€15€12

"The Childhood of Design Exhibition + Collection" ticket

Access to the exhibition according to the time slot chosen, and to the collection, on the day of the visit

€16€13

"Comics, 1964-2024 Exhibition + Collection" ticket

Access to the exhibition according to the time slot chosen, and to the collection, on the day of the visit

€17€14 Guided tour / Workshop:

"Guided Tours" ticket

*In addition to a "Exhibition" or "Collection" ticket

€4.50*

"Workshop" ticket

"Museum tour" ticket

"Family tour" ticket in the museum or exhibitions

• Kid

• Adult

€8

–

€8

Full day tickets :

"All exhibitions + Collection" Day ticket

Access to all exhibitions, as well as to the collection and the Children's Gallery, on the day of the visit

€18€15

"Children's Gallery + Collection" Family Pack

For 2 adults accompanied by 1 to 3 children (under 18)

Access to the Children's Gallery at the chosen time slot, and to the collection, on the day of the visit

€25

Paris Museum Pass

Pass valid for 60 museums and monuments in Paris and the Ile-de-France area, including the Centre Pompidou

2 days: €62

4 days: €77

6 days: €92 Now

Summer Pass – on sale until 31 August 2024

Free unlimited access to the permanent collection until 20 September 2024

*In addition to an "Exhibition" ticket or "All exhibitions + Collection" day ticket€5* Other activities:

"Shows and concerts" ticket

€18

€14

Under 26 years: €10

"Cinema and Video" ticket€5€3

Free admission, subject to availability:

Galerie de photographies

Exhibitions at the public library (BPI)

The View of Paris

On the first Sunday of every month, admission to the permanent collection and the Galerie des enfants is free for everyone.

From 24 July to 11 August 2024 inclusive,

admission to all exhibitions and the Museum is free for under-26s.

Online ticket and time slot reservations are strongly recommended and apply to all visitors,

including beneficiaries of free admission (except for members and professionals).

Buy a ticket online

Or by phone: +33 (0)1 44 78 12 33

Mondays to Saturdays (except public holidays) from 9 am to 7 pm

See conditions for *reduced and free admission

See the general conditions of sale

Consult the list of all our points of sale in detail

*From 11 am to 9.45 pm for the Forum bookshop the boutique; from 11 am to 9 pm for the exhibition bookshop.

Toilets are available on levels –1, 0, 4, 5 and 6.

You will also find baby changing tables on levels 0, 4, 5 and 6.
